title: Patient-Reported Outcomes in Older Adults With Transthyretin Amyloid Cardiomyopathy - JACC

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% completion rate with auto-reminders; [ROADMAP] to integrate reminders in future versions.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Prioritize HIPAA-compliant data storage for secure patient-provided PROs.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: FDA prioritizing PRO integration across HF and ATTR-CM trials within 12 months.
**CONCERN**: Patient selection bias could inflate HR-QoL improvements, affecting clinical validity.
